<h1>b00tl3gRSA3</h1>
<h3>Description</h3>
<pre>Connect <b>nc 2019shell1.picoctf.com 47259</b>, maka diberikan modulus(n), eksponen(e) dan ciphertext(c) pada soal</pre>
<pre>
e : 65537
c : 
n : 
</pre>
<h3>Solution</h3>
<p>Untuk generate p dan q dari modulus(n), Pertama saya coba <a href="factordb.com">factordb</a> untuk memperoleh p dan q, tetapi gagal karena terdapat 3 bilangan prima.
Selanjutnya saya coba <a href="https://www.alpertron.com.ar/ECM.HTM">alpertron</a>, disini saya mendapatkan faktorial untuk memperoleh euclie totient(phi) yaitu
</p><p>euclie totient(phi) = (p1-1)*(p2-1)*(p3-1)....(pn-1)</p>
<pre>
euclie totient(phi) = (8668848317-1)*(8830827641-1)*(9307843373-1)*(9781592153-1)*(9854827877-1)*(10243885369-1)*(10646884907-1)*(10706980619-1)*(10715043497-1)*(11001673603-1)*(11029594549-1)*(11505503453-1)*(11696329019-1)*(11879307611-1)*(12033727319-1)*(12436432639-1)*(12882597307-1)*(13260759569-1)*(14134415437-1)*(14561892617-1)*(14637111821-1)*(14672336501-1)*(14742494651-1)*(15262963789-1)*(15525423227-1)*(15558826391-1)*(15606710381-1)*(15805812793-1)*(15832995631-1)*(15862081967-1)*(15978469757-1)*(16620957097-1)*(16706978969-1)*(17072202053-1)
</pre>
<p>Terakhir, generate privatekey(d) dari phi yang sudah didapatkan dan decrypt ciphertext(c)</p>

```python
import gmpy2

phi = (8668848317-1)*(8830827641-1)*(9307843373-1)*(9781592153-1)*(9854827877-1)*(10243885369-1)*(10646884907-1)*(10706980619-1)*(10715043497-1)*(11001673603-1)*(11029594549-1)*(11505503453-1)*(11696329019-1)*(11879307611-1)*(12033727319-1)*(12436432639-1)*(12882597307-1)*(13260759569-1)*(14134415437-1)*(14561892617-1)*(14637111821-1)*(14672336501-1)*(14742494651-1)*(15262963789-1)*(15525423227-1)*(15558826391-1)*(15606710381-1)*(15805812793-1)*(15832995631-1)*(15862081967-1)*(15978469757-1)*(16620957097-1)*(16706978969-1)*(17072202053-1)
c = 
n = 
e = 65537
d = gmpy2.invert(e,phi)
print(bytes.fromhex(hex(pow(c,d,n))[2:]).decode())
```

<h3>Flag</h3>
<pre>
picoCTF{too_many_fact0rs_3023548}
</pre>
